item.title: Transition to Serverless IT Infrastructure with Azure AD and Intune
item.description: Overview: This project revolved around modernizing a company’s IT infrastructure by migrating it to a serverless model. The endeavor involved replacing the traditional on-premises Active Directory with Azure Active Directory and introducing Microsoft Intune for robust device management. The project also encompassed a shift from the conventional print server to Printix, along with strengthening the security and backup system of the Microsoft cloud environment and emails. Challenge: The company previously lacked a comprehensive device management system and had an outdated on-premises Active Directory.
